column1: The Pit Room////I was about to give up on trying to find great slow smoked bbq that wasn't sold out of a truck or made in my own back yard. I knew we were in for something special when the parking lot was filled with trucks and the parking spaces were large enough to accommodate more than a Mini Cooper or a Smart Car. Portion sizes were great
column2: while the seating inside was limited
column3: there was plenty of seating outside. Staff was super friendly and came out to see how the customers were and chat a little.
